name: Bashyam Kalyanaraman
my_business:
Top Dealer for DAIKIN in South India
Specialised in VRV
Refrigeration and Cold Storage
Service and AMC
top_product: VRV Airconditioners
ideal_referral: up coming Celebrity Houses , Hospitals , Hotels, malls and Builders
top_problem_solved: One of my fellow BNI members, who’s also my client, recently faced a tough situation — his Daikin AC had suddenly stopped working. The part required for repair had been discontinued nearly 3 years ago. But when it comes to my BNI family, I don’t give up that easily. Leveraging my network and experience as India’s No.1 Daikin dealer, I managed to trace and arrange that rare part through my old service contacts. Within no time, his AC was back to perfect cooling. Because at the end of the day, I’m not just an AC dealer — I’m your calm, cool, and comfortable partner. For me, BNI is not just about business — it’s about standing by our members and going that extra mile when it truly matters.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI memory has to be our Baku trip in February 2025, when around 10 couples from our chapter travelled together for 4–5 days. It wasn’t just a holiday — it was a time filled with laughter, connection, and genuine bonding. Spending those days with my fellow members and their families reminded me that BNI is truly my extended family. Over the last 10 years, I’ve built such deep relationships here — relationships that now go beyond business. In fact, with many of my members, the connection feels stronger than family itself. That trip to Baku will always remain close to my heart, because it reminded me why I love being part of BNI — it’s not just about growing business, it’s about growing together.

name: Goutham Reddy
my_business: At Hikeey, we specialize in WhatsApp Marketing and complete digital solutions to help businesses grow online.
top_product: Top Products WhatsApp Marketing Solutions Bulk Messaging, Button Messages, Chatbots, and API Integration for automated engagement and lead generation. Digital Business Cards (Hikeey Cards) Smart, interactive digital visiting cards with lead tracking and WhatsApp integration. Custom Website & App Development Modern, responsive websites and mobile apps tailored to business needs. Performance Marketing Google Ads, Meta (Facebook & Instagram) Ads for lead generation and sales growth. Branding & Creatives Logo Design, Posters, Social Media Creatives that build a strong brand identity. Smart Business Tools Invoice Generator, Event Ticketing System, Job Portal, and more — developed in-house.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business owner, entrepreneur, or marketing manager who wants to grow their brand using WhatsApp Marketing, digital ads, or needs support with branding, websites, or custom software. I’m looking to connect with: Real estate developers Event organizers Coaches & trainers E-commerce businesses Educational institutes Startups & service providers Any business that wants to generate more leads and automate follow-ups If they need more visibility, better engagement, or digital tools to grow — I’d love an introduction!
top_problem_solved: Top Problems We Solve Low Lead Generation → We use WhatsApp, Google & Meta Ads to generate high-quality leads for businesses. Poor Online Presence → We build modern websites, apps, and digital business cards to boost visibility and credibility. Manual Follow-Ups & Delayed Responses → Our WhatsApp automation and chatbots handle instant, smart follow-ups 24/7. Lack of Brand Identity → We create logos, creatives, and brand visuals that make businesses stand out. Inefficient Business Operations → Our custom tools (invoice generators, ticketing, job portals) streamline daily business tasks.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI stories is when I received a referral from a fellow member for a real estate company struggling to follow up with leads. After understanding their pain points, we implemented a WhatsApp automation system with bulk messaging and smart chatbot follow-ups. Within just 2 weeks, they saw a huge improvement in lead response rates, booked more site visits, and even closed 3 deals — all thanks to consistent engagement and automation. Not only did this make the client super happy, but it also turned into 3 more referrals from their network! This experience reminded me of the true power of BNI: Trust, Results & Growth through Relationships.
